00084 
00088 class SURFIT_EXPORT manager {
00089 public:
00091         virtual int load_tag(datafile *df, char * tag_name) const = 0; // -1 = error, 0 = not found, 1 = ok
00093         virtual bool save(datafile *df) const = 0;
00095         virtual void clear_data() const = 0;
00097         virtual void mem_info() const = 0;
00099         virtual void release() = 0;
00101         virtual int data_count() const = 0;
00103         virtual const data * data_get(int i) const = 0;
00104 
00105 #ifdef HAVE_GL_WORKS
00106 
00107         virtual void mem_show() const = 0;
00109         virtual bool check_for_drawing(const char * type) const = 0;
00111         virtual void getMinMaxZ(REAL & minZ, REAL & maxZ) const = 0;
00112 #endif
00113 };
00114 
00118 class surfit_manager : public manager {
00119 public:
00120         int load_tag(datafile *df, char * tag_name) const;
00121         bool save(datafile *df) const;
00122         void clear_data() const;
00123         void mem_info() const;
00124         void release();
00125         int data_count() const;
00126         const data * data_get(int i) const;
00127 #ifdef HAVE_GL_WORKS
00128         void mem_show() const;
00129         bool check_for_drawing(const char * type) const;
00130         void getMinMaxZ(REAL & minZ, REAL & maxZ) const;
00131 #endif
00132 };
00133 
00137 class SURFIT_EXPORT data_manager {
00138 public:
00139 
00141         data_manager();
00143         ~data_manager();
00144 
00146         bool load(datafile *df) const;
00148         bool save(datafile *df) const;
00150         void clear_data() const;
00152         void mem_info() const;
00153 
00154 #ifdef HAVE_GL_WORKS
00155 
00156         void mem_show() const;
00158         bool check_for_drawing(const char * type) const;
00160         void getMinMaxZ(REAL & minZ, REAL & maxZ) const;
00161 #endif
00162 
00164         int data_count() const;
00166         const data * data_get(int i) const;
00167 
00169         std::vector<manager *> *  managers;
00170 };
00171
